CREATE VIEW `view_mappings` AS 
select 
`a`.`id` AS `id`,
`a`.`siteid` AS `siteid`,
`a`.`agentid` AS `agentid`,
`a`.`campaignid` AS `campaignid`,
`b`.`hostname` AS `hostname`,
`b`.`abbr` AS `abbr`,
`b`.`sitename` AS `sitename`,
`c`.`username` AS `username` 
from `agent_site_mappings` `a`, `trans_sites` `b`, `trans_view_agents` `c`
where ((`a`.`siteid` = `b`.`id`) and (`a`.`agentid` = `c`.`id`));
